posts.post_title: Fs/ft: T206 Chase (trophy) SGC 50, S-CAP fact 25!!
posts.post_content: Very sharp card for the grade with the rarest sweet cap back. Card looks like a 5 except for the normal diamond cut found on this issue. Please send me your email for scans, priced at $275, very nice card......thanks, CARD IS AVAILABLE, BUYER BACKED OUT....THANKS
